amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-754 to condition the effective date on a certification that the Bureau of Land Management and other Federal permitting agencies have sufficient staff and funding to comply with the deadlines established by this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 215 (Roll no. 471).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 215 (Roll no. 471).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
